a.t-if: not optional_products and website_sale_order and website_sale_order.website_order_line

div.p: Please fill up the mandatory fields in asterisk (*)

option.t-att-selected: shipping_agent.id == checkout.get('shipping_agent_id').id if (checkout.get('shipping_agent_id') and checkout.get('shipping_agent_id')!= 'CREATE..') else ''

a.class: btn btn-default btn-primary pull-right mb32 a-submit

div.h2:
Thank you for shopping with us.
Your enquiry has been sent to your preferred ship chandler(s).

li.t-att-class: 'active' if (c.id == int(category or 0) and c.id in category_show) else 'inactive'
